description: Comfort starts with the clothes you wear. That’s why our Men's Active Ultralite Tech Tee is a great choice for your next outdoor adventure. Its regular fit gives you room to move, while its flatlock seam construction and offset shoulder seams help reduce chafing. But best of all, it’s made with a combination of Merino wool and recycled polyester, to help manage moisture, regulate temperature, and increase dry time when you start to sweat. Great for a hike in the hills or a jog in the neighborhood, this tee will help you start and stay comfy.
name: Smartwool Active Ultralite Tech Tee - Mens
